product_name: Therm-a-Rest Permanent Home Sleeping Pad Repair Kit
long_description: The Therm-a-Rest Permanent Home Sleeping Pad Repair Kit uses a wet adhesive and fabric patches to make the strongest and most durable Therm-a-Rest mattress repairs possible. It is also the best choice for repairing larger tears. Therm-a-Rest Permanent Home Sleeping Pad Repair Kit works on all Therm-a-Rest mattresses, including NeoAir. Requires a 4 hr. cure time. Includes 3 self-adhesive fabric patches, 2 TearAid(TM) patches, one 2 oz. vinyl adhesive, 2 alcohol wipes and 1 applicator stick.
short_description: The Therm-a-Rest Permanent Home Sleeping Pad Repair Kit uses a wet adhesive and fabric patches to make the strongest and most durable Therm-a-Rest mattress repairs possible.
